title: Browser-Based LLM Inference Engine
shortDescription: Run large language models directly in the browser using WebGPU and WASM
fullDescription: Build a groundbreaking inference engine that runs LLMs entirely in the browser without server calls. Uses WebGPU for GPU acceleration, WASM for performance, and quantization techniques to reduce model size. Features streaming generation, temperature control, and system prompt customization. Includes model caching, offline support, and privacy-first architecture where user data never leaves the device.
architecture: Client-side only architecture with WebGPU compute shaders, WASM modules for tokenization, IndexedDB for model storage, Service Workers for offline support, and Web Workers for non-blocking inference

title: Next.js 14 Dashboard with RSC
shortDescription: Enterprise dashboard leveraging React Server Components and Server Actions
fullDescription: Create a modern enterprise dashboard that fully utilizes React Server Components, Server Actions, and the Next.js 14 App Router. Features streaming SSR, progressive enhancement, and zero client-side JavaScript where possible. Includes real-time data with server-sent events, optimistic updates, and partial prerendering. Demonstrates the future of full-stack React development.
architecture: Full-stack Next.js with App Router, Server Components for data fetching, Client Components for interactivity, Server Actions for mutations, Streaming with Suspense, and Edge runtime where beneficial

title: Flutter 3D Product Viewer
shortDescription: Cross-platform 3D product visualization app with AR integration
fullDescription: Develop a Flutter application that renders 3D product models with realistic materials, lighting, and animations. Supports GLTF/GLB formats, PBR materials, and skeletal animations. Includes AR placement using ARKit/ARCore, gesture controls, and real-time customization. Features cloud model streaming, memory optimization, and platform-specific performance tuning.
architecture: Flutter with platform channels for AR native modules, Isar for local model cache, GraphQL for model metadata, and custom 3D renderer optimizations for mobile GPUs

title: WebRTC Collaborative Video Editor
shortDescription: Browser-based collaborative video editor with real-time effects
fullDescription: Build a professional video editing platform that runs entirely in the browser with WebRTC for collaboration. Features timeline editing, real-time effects using WebGL shaders, and peer-to-peer asset sharing. Includes video compositing, transitions, text overlays, and audio mixing. Supports WebCodecs for efficient encoding and MediaRecorder for export.

title: React Native On-Device AI Chat
shortDescription: Mobile chat app with on-device LLM using MLX and Core ML
fullDescription: Create a privacy-focused mobile chat application that runs LLMs entirely on-device using Apple's MLX and Core ML for iOS, and TensorFlow Lite for Android. Features streaming responses, conversation memory, and RAG with on-device vector database. Includes voice input with on-device speech recognition and TTS. Zero data leaves the user's device.

title: Tauri Markdown Editor with AI
shortDescription: Lightning-fast markdown editor built with Tauri and Rust
fullDescription: Develop a high-performance markdown editor using Tauri for a tiny binary size and low memory footprint. Features real-time preview, custom theming, Vim mode, and local AI autocomplete. Uses Rust for file system operations and TypeScript for the UI. Includes Git integration, plugin system, and encrypted notes. Cross-platform with native feel.

title: SwiftUI Health Analytics App
shortDescription: Advanced health analytics with SwiftUI and HealthKit
fullDescription: Build a sophisticated health analytics application for iOS using SwiftUI and HealthKit. Features advanced visualizations, trend analysis, and ML-based insights. Includes workout recommendations, sleep pattern analysis, and nutrition tracking. Uses Core ML for activity classification and Create ML for personalized insights. Privacy-first with on-device processing.

title: SvelteKit Real-time Polls Platform
shortDescription: Lightning-fast polling platform with WebAssembly and WebSockets
fullDescription: Create a high-performance real-time polling platform using SvelteKit and WebSockets. Features instant vote updates, complex poll types, and advanced analytics. Uses WebAssembly for client-side vote verification and fraud detection. Includes embedding capabilities, OAuth integration, and export features. Optimized for mobile and SEO with SvelteKit's server-side rendering.

title: Jetpack Compose Material 3 Design System
shortDescription: Dynamic design system with Material 3 and Compose Multiplatform
fullDescription: Build a comprehensive Material 3 design system for Compose Multiplatform that works on Android, iOS, and desktop. Features dynamic color theming from wallpapers, custom components, and accessibility support. Includes a component gallery, live preview, and theming playground. Demonstrates best practices for scalable Compose UI architecture.

title: Remix SaaS Starter Kit
shortDescription: Production-ready SaaS starter with Remix and Stripe
fullDescription: Create a comprehensive SaaS starter kit using Remix for full-stack React applications. Features multi-tenancy, subscription billing with Stripe, team management, and role-based access control. Includes email automation, background jobs, and analytics. Built with best practices for SEO, performance, and developer experience.

title: FastAPI GraphQL Federation Gateway
shortDescription: Enterprise GraphQL federation gateway with FastAPI
fullDescription: Build a production-ready GraphQL federation gateway using FastAPI that composes multiple subgraphs into a unified API. Implements Apollo Federation v2 specification, distributed tracing, and query cost analysis. Includes schema registry, persisted queries, and real-time subscriptions. Designed for microservices architecture with subgraphs in different languages.

title: SolidJS Reactive Form Library
shortDescription: High-performance form library with fine-grained reactivity
fullDescription: Create a form management library for SolidJS that leverages fine-grained reactivity for optimal performance. Features schema validation, nested fields, arrays, and dynamic forms. Includes built-in accessibility, form state persistence, and integration with popular UI libraries. Demonstrates advanced SolidJS patterns for state management and rendering optimization.

title: Go Temporal Workflow Orchestrator
shortDescription: Distributed workflow engine using Temporal and Go
fullDescription: Build a robust workflow orchestration platform using Temporal and Go for managing long-running, fault-tolerant business processes. Implements complex workflows with human intervention, saga patterns, and compensation transactions. Includes workflow visualization, metrics collection, and retry policies. Perfect for order processing, approval workflows, and ETL pipelines.

title: Astro Content Platform
shortDescription: Blazing-fast content platform with Astro and islands architecture
fullDescription: Create a modern content platform using Astro's islands architecture for optimal performance. Features MDX authoring, headless CMS integration, and dynamic content loading with partial hydration. Includes advanced search, comment system, newsletter integration, and analytics. Demonstrates content collections, image optimization, and hybrid rendering strategies.

title: Flutter Rust Performance Engine
shortDescription: High-performance Flutter app with Rust FFI for compute-intensive tasks
fullDescription: Build a Flutter application that offloads performance-critical operations to Rust via FFI for maximum performance and memory safety. Implements image processing, cryptographic operations, and complex calculations in Rust. Features seamless bidirectional communication, hot reload support, and platform-specific optimizations. Includes benchmarking and profiling tools.

title: React Three Fiber Architectural Visualizer
shortDescription: Browser-based architectural visualization with React Three Fiber
fullDescription: Develop a sophisticated architectural visualization platform using React Three Fiber and Drei. Features realistic PBR materials, global illumination, and post-processing effects. Includes floor plan navigation, material swapping, and furniture placement. Supports glTF/glB models, real-time lighting updates, and VR viewing with WebXR.

title: Kotlin Spring Boot Reactive API
shortDescription: High-performance reactive API with Kotlin and Spring WebFlux
fullDescription: Build a fully reactive REST API using Kotlin, Spring WebFlux, and R2DBC for non-blocking database access. Features functional endpoints, coroutines support, and reactive security. Implements event streaming with SSE and WebFlux's reactive types. Includes comprehensive testing with StepVerifier and TestPublisher.

title: React Native Skia Graphics Engine
shortDescription: High-performance 2D graphics engine with React Native Skia
fullDescription: Create a powerful 2D graphics and animation engine using React Native Skia. Implements custom drawing, vector graphics, and complex animations with 60fps performance. Features image filters, path operations, and text layout. Includes a declarative API similar to SVG, state-driven animations, and gesture interactions.

title: Django Ninja GraphQL Platform
shortDescription: Modern GraphQL API with Django Ninja and Strawberry
fullDescription: Build a high-performance GraphQL API using Django Ninja for REST endpoints and Strawberry for GraphQL. Features schema federation, dataloader optimization, and real-time subscriptions. Includes advanced filtering, pagination, and query optimization. Demonstrates best practices for modern Django development with type hints and async support.

title: Qwik Microfrontend Orchestrator
shortDescription: Resumable microfrontends with Qwik and Module Federation
fullDescription: Create a microfrontend architecture using Qwik's resumability and Webpack Module Federation. Features instant loading, progressive hydration, and shared dependencies. Implements cross-application state management, routing integration, and performance budgets. Demonstrates enterprise-scale frontend architecture with optimal Core Web Vitals.

title: Android Ktor Multiplatform Client
shortDescription: Kotlin Multiplatform app with Ktor client and SQLDelight
fullDescription: Build a Kotlin Multiplatform application sharing networking and database code across Android, iOS, and desktop. Uses Ktor client for HTTP requests and SQLDelight for type-safe SQL. Implements offline-first architecture with cache invalidation and conflict resolution. Features reactive UI with Compose Multiplatform and platform-specific optimizations.

title: ElysiaJS Bun Runtime API
shortDescription: High-performance API with ElysiaJS running on Bun
fullDescription: Build a blazing-fast REST and GraphQL API using ElysiaJS, a Bun-first web framework. Features end-to-end type safety with Eden Treaty, built-in validation with Zod, and super-fast startup times. Implements JWT authentication, file uploads, and WebSocket real-time features. Demonstrates Bun's speed for development and production.

title: PWA Wallet Connect Bridge
shortDescription: Progressive Web App with WalletConnect v2 and WebAuthn
fullDescription: Develop a cutting-edge PWA that acts as a Web3 wallet using WalletConnect v2 for dApp connections and WebAuthn for biometric authentication. Features passkey support, secure enclave key storage, and transaction simulation. Works completely offline for transaction signing and syncs across devices with end-to-end encryption.

title: SwiftUI Vision Pro Spatial App
shortDescription: Immersive spatial computing app for Apple Vision Pro
fullDescription: Create a spatial computing application for Apple Vision Pro using SwiftUI and RealityKit. Features volumetric windows, 3D object manipulation, and spatial gestures. Implements immersive spaces, hand tracking, and audio spatialization. Includes shared spaces for multi-user collaboration and integrates with ARKit for environment understanding.

title: tRPC with NestJS Backend
shortDescription: End-to-end type-safe APIs with tRPC and NestJS
fullDescription: Build a full-stack application with tRPC providing end-to-end type safety between NestJS backend and React/Next.js frontend. Features automatic TypeScript inference, real-time subscriptions, and middleware support. Implements authentication, file uploads, and batch requests. Demonstrates tRPC as a modern alternative to REST/GraphQL.

title: React Native Vision Camera AI
shortDescription: Real-time camera app with on-device ML using Vision Camera
fullDescription: Develop a powerful camera application using React Native Vision Camera with real-time AI processing. Implements object detection, text recognition, and face analysis entirely on-device. Features custom frame processors, QR/barcode scanning, and document detection. Includes gesture controls, filters, and video recording with ML enhancement.

title: HTMX + Django Real-time App
shortDescription: Modern web app with HTMX and Django without JavaScript frameworks
fullDescription: Build a reactive web application using HTMX with Django backend, eliminating the need for complex JavaScript frameworks. Features real-time updates, server-sent events, and optimistic UI. Implements infinite scroll, inline editing, and form validation. Demonstrates how HTMX can create SPAs with minimal JavaScript and maximum simplicity.

title: Compose Multiplatform IDE-like App
shortDescription: Feature-rich desktop application with Compose Multiplatform
fullDescription: Create a complex desktop application using Compose Multiplatform that runs on Windows, macOS, and Linux. Implements MDI interface, custom text editor with syntax highlighting, and file system browser. Features plugin system, theming engine, and native file dialogs. Demonstrates Compose's capabilities for professional desktop software.

title: Python + Rust ML Inference Service
shortDescription: High-performance ML inference service with Python bindings to Rust
fullDescription: Build a hybrid ML inference service where performance-critical components are written in Rust and exposed to Python via PyO3. Implements fast tokenization, tensor operations, and post-processing in Rust while using Python for model loading and orchestration. Features SIMD optimizations, memory pooling, and zero-copy serialization.

title: Lit Element Web Component Library
shortDescription: Framework-agnostic UI library with Lit and Web Components
fullDescription: Build a comprehensive UI component library using Lit and Web Components that works with any framework (React, Vue, Angular, or vanilla JS). Features reactive properties, shadow DOM encapsulation, and CSS custom properties for theming. Includes 20+ accessible components, documentation site, and interactive playground.

title: Jetpack Paging 3 Offline-First App
shortDescription: Offline-first Android app with Paging 3 and Room
fullDescription: Create a sophisticated offline-first Android application using Jetpack Paging 3 for efficient data loading and Room for local storage. Implements remote mediator for network-local synchronization, efficient database queries, and reactive UI with Flow. Features infinite scrolling, search, and content filtering with offline capabilities.

title: Nuxt 3 E-commerce Platform
shortDescription: Modern e-commerce platform with Nuxt 3 and Stripe
fullDescription: Build a feature-rich e-commerce platform using Nuxt 3 with server-side rendering, hybrid rendering, and edge-side rendering capabilities. Features product catalog, shopping cart, secure checkout with Stripe, and order management. Implements advanced SEO strategies, image optimization, and personalized recommendations.

title: Flutter Wear OS Companion App
shortDescription: Cross-platform wearable app with Flutter for Wear OS
fullDescription: Develop a wearable application using Flutter targeting Wear OS with round/rectangular screen support. Features heart rate monitoring, step counting, and workout tracking. Implements tile system, complications API, and data sync with companion phone app. Demonstrates Flutter's capabilities for modern wearables development.

title: Rust Axum Production API
shortDescription: Production-ready REST API with Axum and SQLx
fullDescription: Build a high-performance, production-ready REST API using Axum web framework in Rust. Features async database access with SQLx, OpenAPI documentation, and comprehensive error handling. Implements JWT authentication, rate limiting, and request tracing. Demonstrates Rust's safety and performance for backend services.

title: Svelte 5 Runes Dashboard
shortDescription: Next-gen Svelte dashboard with Runes reactivity system
fullDescription: Create a cutting-edge dashboard application using Svelte 5's new Runes reactivity system. Features signals-based state management, derived state, and effects with automatic dependency tracking. Implements complex data visualizations, real-time updates, and dynamic theming. Demonstrates the future of Svelte development.

title: React Native TV App
shortDescription: Android TV and Apple TV app with React Native
fullDescription: Build a streaming application for Android TV and Apple TV using React Native TV. Features 10-foot UI design, remote control navigation, and adaptive bitrate streaming. Implements search, continue watching, and personalized recommendations. Supports DRM content, offline downloads, and voice search.

title: FastAPI + dlt Data Pipeline
shortDescription: Modern data pipeline with FastAPI and data load tool
fullDescription: Create a robust data ingestion pipeline using FastAPI and dlt (data load tool) for extracting, normalizing, and loading data from various sources. Features schema evolution, incremental loading, and data validation. Implements REST API for data ingestion, transformation pipelines, and data quality monitoring.

title: SwiftUI Core Data Sync Engine
shortDescription: iCloud sync engine for SwiftUI + Core Data apps
fullDescription: Develop a sophisticated synchronization engine for SwiftUI apps using Core Data with CloudKit. Implements conflict resolution, background sync, and offline support. Features real-time updates across devices, shared containers, and custom merge policies. Includes sync status visualization and manual conflict resolution UI.

title: Angular 17 Signals CRM
fullDescription: Build a modern CRM application using Angular 17's new signals-based reactivity system. Features fine-grained change detection, computed signals, and effect management. Implements complex data tables, dynamic forms, and real-time notifications. Demonstrates Angular's evolution towards more efficient rendering and simpler state management.
shortDescription: Modern CRM with Angular 17 signals and fine-grained reactivity

title: Flutter BLE IoT Controller
shortDescription: Cross-platform BLE device controller with Flutter
fullDescription: Create a universal Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) device controller app using Flutter. Scans for nearby BLE devices, connects, and interacts with custom GATT services. Features device discovery, characteristic read/write/notify operations, and OTA firmware updates. Includes device profiles for common IoT devices like sensors, lights, and locks.

title: Go GraphQL Federation Gateway
shortDescription: GraphQL federation gateway with Go and gqlgen
fullDescription: Build a high-performance GraphQL federation gateway using Go and gqlgen that composes multiple subgraphs. Implements Apollo Federation v2 specification, entity resolution, and query planning. Features distributed tracing, persisted queries, and subscription support. Designed for microservices architecture with subgraphs in any language.

title: Astro Starlight Documentation Portal
shortDescription: Beautiful documentation portal with Astro Starlight
fullDescription: Create a comprehensive documentation portal using Astro Starlight, the new documentation theme from the Astro team. Features MDX support, full-text search, versioning, and dark mode. Implements automated API documentation generation, interactive code examples, and multi-language support. Perfect for open-source projects and product documentation.

title: React Native visionOS Spatial App
shortDescription: Spatial computing app with React Native for visionOS
fullDescription: Pioneer spatial computing development by building a visionOS application using React Native's new visionOS support. Features volumetric windows, 3D object rendering with Reality Composer Pro, and spatial gestures. Implements hand tracking, immersive spaces, and audio spatialization. Demonstrates React Native's expansion into Apple's spatial computing platform.

title: Hono Cloudflare Workers API
shortDescription: Edge-native API with Hono and Cloudflare Workers
fullDescription: Build a blazing-fast edge API using Hono, a ultrafast web framework designed for Cloudflare Workers. Features zero-dependency, TypeScript-first design, and middleware system. Implements JWT authentication, D1 database integration, and R2 object storage. Demonstrates the power of edge computing with near-zero cold starts.

title: Jetpack Compose Wear OS App
shortDescription: Modern Wear OS app with Jetpack Compose for Wear
fullDescription: Develop a feature-rich Wear OS application using Jetpack Compose for Wear. Implements curved layouts, position indicators, and wearable-optimized components. Features health tracking, workout coaching, and watch face complications. Demonstrates Google's modern approach to wearable development with declarative UI.

title: Phoenix LiveView Realtime App
shortDescription: Real-time web app with Phoenix LiveView and Elixir
fullDescription: Build a real-time web application using Phoenix LiveView with Elixir, where UI updates happen over WebSocket without custom JavaScript. Features collaborative editing, live dashboard, and real-time notifications. Implements PubSub, presence tracking, and fault-tolerant design. Demonstrates the power of the actor model for web development.
